question.title: trying to take photo and run arcore for orientation detection using shared camera approach in java
question.body:
I want to capture an image but also use arcore at the same time to track the orientation of the device

google drive link where I have a code and log

I am a student and I am trying to learn something. Most of this code is ai generated but I am stuck at a problem that even ai is not able to solve

in this code the camera preview seems to works fine but for some reason I cannot get the arcore to work and get the orientation. in the log it shows that the state of arcore is paused but I don't know why. whats wrong?
